error.message: Class Drupal\linkit\Plugin\Linkit\Substitution\Canonical not found and could not be autoloaded.
Class Drupal\linkit\Plugin\Linkit\Substitution\Canonical not found and could not be autoloaded.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to linkit_media_file_direct.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
